definition: person suffering (from a disease or poisoning)/a patient

sentences.english: Like humans, marmosets that die from the disease do so within 20 days of becoming ill.
sentences.chinese: 如同人类，绒猴患病后的20天内将会死亡。

sentences.english: On October 12 two sick children arrived at the hospital in a vehicle from a nomad encampment.
sentences.chinese: 在10月12日有两名患病儿童从牧区乘车来到医院。

sentences.english: Vaccine greatly reduces the number of polio cases.
sentences.chinese: 索克疫苗极大地减少了患病人数。

sentences.english: ISH is more prent among women than men in both races.
sentences.chinese: 在这两个种族中，女性的ISH患病率高于男性。

sentences.english: When ill they are anxious for a hasty recovery.
sentences.chinese: 当他们患病时都渴望可瞬间康复。

sentences.english: The risk of animal zoonoses is perhaps the biggest cause of public concern with meat.
sentences.chinese: 人畜共患病风险可能是公众对肉类关注的最主要原因。

sentences.english: Alarmingly, of women who develop the disease, 55% have no known risk factors.
sentences.chinese: 令人担忧的是55%患病的人不知原因。

sentences.english: The five people sickened in California and three in Texas have all recovered.
sentences.chinese: 患病的5人在加利福尼亚州和得克萨斯州三都收回。

sentences.english: A pair of genes was recessiveness homozygote, it was probably to be ill.
sentences.chinese: 只要有一对基因隐性纯合时，即可患病。

sentences.english: People with anaplasmosis usually live in Henan, Guangdong and Guangxi provinces.
sentences.chinese: 患病人群主要分布在河南及两广地区。

sentences.english: The incidence of female urinary incontinence was 29.
sentences.chinese: 结果利川市成年女性尿失禁的总患病率为29。

sentences.english: Use of smokeless tobacco also raises the risk.
sentences.chinese: 即使吸食低焦油的烟草也同样会提高患病风险。

sentences.english: Mo said her daughter had not yet shown any symptoms of illness.
sentences.chinese: 莫女士表示，她的孩子至今没有表现出患病症状。

sentences.english: and if I enter into the city, then behold them that are sick with famine!
sentences.chinese: 我若进入城内，就见有因饥荒患病的。

sentences.english: The strategic use of the appropriate vaccines to contain and isolate disease clusters
sentences.chinese: 策略地使用适当疫苗以遏制和隔离患病畜群。

sentences.english: For unknown reasons, the prence of hypertension seems to be decreasing in the USA.
sentences.chinese: 目前，美国高血压患病率似在降低，原因尚不清楚。

definition: to suffer (from an illness)/to fall ill
to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
to fall ill/to contract a disease
person suffering (from a disease or poisoning)/a patient
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
